channel.title: Unreal Tournament 3 Xbox
channel.description:
UT3 is released on xbox 360 Tomorrow, Friday 4th July!
I'm getting it tomorrow, and i think it will be great. I've only ever played on UT2004 for the PC, and UT3 looks amazing on PS3, although on Xbox you won't be able to add any other mods, or download other UT maps, which is gay..
Anyone else getting this for 360 ? Or anything good about it on PS3?

item.title: Unreal Tournament 3 Xbox
item.dc:creator: @kaza Kaza
item.description:
@kaza wrote:

The missing weapon is the Ripper.

The achievements on the game are fairly hard to get, don’t know if there online or not, although i assume they are.

The campaign is short, and repetitive, but at least it had a small amount of a storyline to it.

Read full topic

Doesn’t it have Vehicles as well ? And the hover board looks fun :D.

Yeah its got epic vechiles, the Daywalkers my fav

item.title: Unreal Tournament 3 Xbox
item.dc:creator: @kaza Kaza
item.description:
@kaza wrote:

Redeemer was fun to control on 2K4, then seeing the big explosion in the background and the “MONSTER KILL!!” play.

Doesn’t it have Vehicles as well ? And the hover board looks fun :D.

STH, on PS3, or Xbox ?

item.title: Unreal Tournament 3 Xbox
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

The Ps3 version of the game was pretty much identical to the PC version with the ability to use keyboard and mouse and performance being pretty much just as good. The only thing that let it down for me was the lack of people playing online, but UT has always been popular in america and as the 360 is most popular in america maybe it could take off on the 360.

Read full topic

item.title: Unreal Tournament 3 Xbox
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

It’s alright.

I was a HUGEEEE fan of Unreal Tournament. 2k4 was actually pretty fun.

UT3 is just UT super suped up. Same weapons (missing redeemer so far I think) just extra high tech. And everything looks better.

All in all. I’m really glad it’s just like UT and kept all of the fun things from that, but at the same time it’s just not that old UT I loved.

Anyways, it’s pretty fun to play. I especially love the Kill Slow Down mutator or whatever it’s called. It’s a beautiful thing to run into a room, headshot someone, game slows down, and then turn and kill three others for a multikill.

BTW I’ve had this game for three days now.

Read full topic
